actions.description: The githyanki makes three Staff attacks, three Telekinetic Bolt attacks, or a combination thereof.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.
actions.name: Staff

actions.description: 8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.
actions.name: Telekinetic Bolt

actions.description:
The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: druidcraft, light, mage hand (the hand is invisible)

2/day each: invisibility (self only), pass without trace (self only)

1/day each: dominate monster, forcecage, plane shift, telekinesis
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
